I hope you like it Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Avacado - Ripped - 1 - chopped
  • Carrot - 1/2 - grated
  • Yellow zucchini - diced - peeled off
  • Cucumber - 2 mini - peeled off - diced
  • White onion - 2 tb sp - chopped
  • Cilantro - 1/4 cup
Mint Dressing:
  • Mint leaves - 30
  • Cashew nuts - 4
  • Almonds - 4
  • Salt - Â 1 tsp
  • Cumin powder - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper powder Â - 1 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1/2 tsp
  • Ginger - 6 pieces - small
  • Garlic cloves - 2 peeled off & chopped
  • Honey - 1 tb sp
  • Lemon juice - 1 1/2 tb sp
  • Water - 80 ml
Procedure:
  • Add all chopped veggies in a mixing bowl
  • Next add all mint dressing ingredients in blender
  • Blend it into fine paste
  • Add this paste in mixing bowl & mix well
  • Salad is ready to serve
